articles.title: Biden administration upholds ban on disciplining athletes accused of sexual misconduct, punts ruling on transgender athletes
articles.description: On the 50th anniversary of Title IX, the Biden administration proposed a range of changes to the law, but upheld a ban on disciplining athletes accused of sexual misconduct before a case is decided, and punted ruling on transgender athletes in sports.
